alert.note: Alert for Coastal Citrus; Coastal Hernando; Coastal Levy; Inland Citrus; Inland Hernando; Inland Levy (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 4:08PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Citrus, western Hernando and southwestern Levy Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 408 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles south of Fowlers Bluff to 17 miles west of Rainbow Lakes Estates to near Homosassa Springs to North Weeki Wachee. Movement was southwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Spring Hill, Homosassa Springs, Weeki Wachee, Crystal River Airport, Homosassa, Weeki Wachee Gardens, Pine Island, North Weeki Wachee, Timber Pines, Black Diamond, Sugarmill Woods, Inglis, Royal Highlands, Lecanto, High Point, Citronelle, Leisure Acres, Glen Lakes, Pine Ridge, and Brookridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
